5 // <summary>
6 // Animation helpers for <see cref="Storyboard"/>
7 // </summary>
8 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9 
10 namespace Fasetto.Word
11 {
12  using System;
13  using System.Windows;
14  using System.Windows.Media.Animation;
15 
16  /// <summary>
17  /// Animation helpers for <see cref="Storyboard"/>
18  /// </summary>
19  public static class StoryBoardHelpers
20  {
21  #region Public Methods
22 
23  /// <summary>
24  /// Adds a fade in animation
25  /// </summary>
26  /// <param name="storyboard">The storyboard to add the animation to.</param>
27  /// <param name="seconds">Amount of seconds it takes to fade in</param>
28  public static void AddFadeIn(
29  this Storyboard storyboard,
30  float seconds)
31  {
32  // Create the margin animate from right
33  var animation =
34  new DoubleAnimation { Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds)), From = 0, To = 1 };
35 
36  // Set the target property name
37  Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(animation, new PropertyPath("Opacity"));
38 
39  // Add the animation to the storyboard
40  storyboard.Children.Add(animation);
41  }
42 
43  /// <summary>
44  /// Adds a fade out animation
45  /// </summary>
46  /// <param name="storyboard">The storyboard to add the animation to.</param>
47  /// <param name="seconds">Amount of seconds it takes to fade in</param>
48  public static void AddFadeOut(
49  this Storyboard storyboard,
50  float seconds)
51  {
52  // Create the margin animate from right
53  var animation =
54  new DoubleAnimation { Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds)), From = 1, To = 0 };
55 
56  // Set the target property name
57  Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(animation, new PropertyPath("Opacity"));
58 
59  // Add the animation to the storyboard
60  storyboard.Children.Add(animation);
61  }
62 
63  /// <summary>
64  /// Adds a slide effect (from left) to the <see cref="Storyboard"/>.
65  /// </summary>
66  /// <param name="storyboard">The storyboard to add the animation to.</param>
67  /// <param name="seconds">How long the slide effect lasts</param>
68  /// <param name="offset">The distance to the right to start from</param>
69  /// <param name="decelerationRatio">The rate of deceleration.</param>
70  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
71  public static void AddSlideFromLeft(
72  this Storyboard storyboard,
73  float seconds,
74  double offset,
75  float decelerationRatio = 0.9f,
76  bool keepMargin = true)
77  {
78  // Create the margin animate from right
79  var animation = new ThicknessAnimation
80  {
81  Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds)),
82  From = new Thickness(-offset, 0, keepMargin ? offset : 0, 0),
83  To = new Thickness(0),
84  DecelerationRatio = decelerationRatio
85  };
86 
87  // Set the target property name
88  Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(animation, new PropertyPath("Margin"));
89 
90  // Add the animation to the storyboard
91  storyboard.Children.Add(animation);
92  }
93 
94  /// <summary>
95  /// Adds a slide effect (from right) to the <see cref="Storyboard"/>.
96  /// </summary>
97  /// <param name="storyboard">The storyboard to add the animation to.</param>
98  /// <param name="seconds">How long the slide effect lasts</param>
99  /// <param name="offset">The distance to the right to start from</param>
100  /// <param name="decelerationRatio">The rate of deceleration.</param>
101  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
102  public static void AddSlideFromRight(
103  this Storyboard storyboard,
104  float seconds,
105  double offset,
106  float decelerationRatio = 0.9f,
107  bool keepMargin = true)
108  {
109  // Create the margin animate from right
110  var animation = new ThicknessAnimation
111  {
112  Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds)),
113  From = new Thickness(keepMargin ? offset : 0, 0, -offset, 0),
114  To = new Thickness(0),
115  DecelerationRatio = decelerationRatio
116  };
117 
118  // Set the target property name
119  Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(animation, new PropertyPath("Margin"));
120 
121  // Add the animation to the storyboard
122  storyboard.Children.Add(animation);
123  }
124 
125  /// <summary>
126  /// Adds a slide effect (to left) to the <see cref="Storyboard"/>.
127  /// </summary>
128  /// <param name="storyboard">The storyboard to add the animation to.</param>
129  /// <param name="seconds">How long the slide effect lasts</param>
130  /// <param name="offset">The distance to the right to start from</param>
131  /// <param name="decelerationRatio">The rate of deceleration.</param>
132  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
133  public static void AddSlideToLeft(
134  this Storyboard storyboard,
135  float seconds,
136  double offset,
137  float decelerationRatio = 0.9f,
138  bool keepMargin = true)
139  {
140  // Create the margin animate from right
141  var animation = new ThicknessAnimation
142  {
143  Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds)),
144  From = new Thickness(0),
145  To = new Thickness(-offset, 0, keepMargin ? offset : 0, 0),
146  DecelerationRatio = decelerationRatio
147  };
148 
149  // Set the target property name
150  Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(animation, new PropertyPath("Margin"));
151 
152  // Add the animation to the storyboard
153  storyboard.Children.Add(animation);
154  }
155 
156  /// <summary>
157  /// Adds a slide effect (to right) to the <see cref="Storyboard"/>.
158  /// </summary>
159  /// <param name="storyboard">The storyboard to add the animation to.</param>
160  /// <param name="seconds">How long the slide effect lasts</param>
161  /// <param name="offset">The distance to the right to start from</param>
162  /// <param name="decelerationRatio">The rate of deceleration.</param>
163  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
164  public static void AddSlideToRight(
165  this Storyboard storyboard,
166  float seconds,
167  double offset,
168  float decelerationRatio = 0.9f,
169  bool keepMargin = true)
170  {
171  // Create the margin animate from right
172  var animation = new ThicknessAnimation
173  {
174  Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds)),
175  From = new Thickness(0),
176  To = new Thickness(keepMargin ? offset : 0, 0, -offset, 0),
177  DecelerationRatio = decelerationRatio
178  };
179 
180  // Set the target property name
181  Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(animation, new PropertyPath("Margin"));
182 
183  // Add the animation to the storyboard
184  storyboard.Children.Add(animation);
185  }
186 
187  #endregion Public Methods
188  }
189 }
